## addDurationToDate() function

### addDurationToDate() function

addDurationToDate adds given duration to given date and returns a new Date object

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function addDurationToDate(date: Date | number, duration: Duration): Date;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { addDurationToDate } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | <code>Date &#124; number</code> | date to add to. Can be either Date object or a number (milliseconds since epoch) |
|  duration | <code>Duration</code> | duration to add. For example '2m', '5h 20s' |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Date`
